name: Manav
description:
Manav is greengrocer game. Your character gathers his product from garden and sells at town.

Your main character have a garden with lemon trees, onion plants, garlic plants, parsley plants. You can gather these resources unlimited.
Plants will grow again after few seconds you gather resources. Gathered resources will go to your boxes in the town.
You can carry 3 resources in the town. After select your 3 target resources, you will search for customer who wanted these resources.
If character find customer who wanted any of these resources, can sell his product and gain money. Manav is easy, relaxing game about this gathering and selling resources circle.
